title: Lady Gaga - G.U.Y. (Shortened Music Video - FLAC)
description:
Lady Gaga
"G.U.Y."
Music Video
Tootie Edit Version

Container: MKV

Video:
1080p h.264 (Variable fps)
Source:
1080p YouTube FLV (Direct stream copy)

Audio Stream 1: "Album FLAC" (Default)
FLAC (1092kbps)
Source:
ARTPOP CD Album

Audio Stream 2: "Original AAC"
AAC VBR
Source:
1080p YouTube FLV (Direct stream copy)
Notes:
Timecode offset applied for syncing purposes
Because this is a direct stream copy, some audio from the video not intended to be in this edited version is present in the stream.

Overall average bitrate: 5287 kbps

Zoom Player Scene Cut file also included.


Losslessly editing this music video presented numerous challenges due to its dynamic frame rate. I ultimately ended up utilizing mkvmerge's splitting feature to get the parts of the video that I wanted, which preserved timing. Because of sub-optimal keyframe placement and because I could not infuse re-encoded frames, the beginning of the video isn't exactly where I wanted it. For Zoom Player users, I've included a cut scene file that will (usually) start playback at the desired frame. For reference, this is 1 second after the beginning of the video (according to the file generated by Zoom Player).
